metadata.title: CVE-2017-0823 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Android system (rild).Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1,7.1.2. Android ID: A-37896655.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
